TopicTitle: I need you to test this engine (do poll after testing)

Articles.Content:
Hey guys I have a request for you guys.

Can you guys test this engine that is partially done?

Its a Liquid Fuel Engine and I need someone to test it for me because I cant install KSP (or Steam [it uninstalled both of them along with my internet.])

So anyway there is a different installation process and most of you don't read the README.txt files so I will put part of it here: 

1.Please add in an engine model please (KSP isn't working for me and I cant create new models or copy KSP models)
2. change the config to use the mesh of your engine model
3. proceed to install normal

 

good luck at please do the poll after you test the engine

 

GitHub File for the almost done engine:

Engine with README.txt that no one will read
May I mention that this sub-forum is about plugin development ? This is not a plugin.

oh sorry

i didn't see a section for mod development

ok I have ksp and internet so ima delete this soon
